title: Saudi Developers Jump as Kingdom Moves to Open Property Market
description: Saudi Arabian developers’ shares jumped the most in four months as the kingdom began implementing new laws allowing foreigners to own a wider range of local real estate assets, including in the holy cities of Mecca and Madinah.
content: Saudi Arabian developers’ shares jumped the most in four months as the kingdom began implementing new laws allowing foreigners to own a wider range of local real estate assets, including in the holy cities of Mecca and Madinah.
